description:
Amidst the unfolding of Rojet`s schemes, Yuugo and Serena try to start their Duel. Yuugo is unsettled by Serena`s resemblance to his childhood friend Rin, but after taking Serena`s first attack, he dives into the Duel with everything he`s got!! But just as Yuugo is setting up an attack, something strange happens on the highway course. Something feels wrong, but they continue their battle. How will this Duel resolve?!
Source: crunchyroll
